column4: does anyone know of a good text based brwser (preferably multi tabbed) that can access my router?  w3m for some reason will log in but not display anything, i dont know if there is a fix or not but rather just install one that is running right off the bat
since i am at work and my lunch break is about to end in an nother 5 miunutes
I highly recommend links or elinks.
mutt would definitely be my recommendation.
